Cities like Zurich have lots of car rental places nearby. They're very easy to reach if you arrive in a city by public transport. One-way rentals within Switzerland It’s worth noting that many companies allow one-way rentals within Switzerland. This can be a great option for itineraries like arriving in Zurich, doing a road trip through the country and flying out of Geneva. There’s usually an extra fee for this, but it might not be exorbitant within the same country. Always ask or check the terms when booking. One-way international rentals, as in dropping the car in a different country, can incur very high fees. It’s often cheaper to keep your rental within Switzerland and return it there. Local agencies In addition to the big international brands, Switzerland has some local car rental companies or dealers that rent cars. These might sometimes have better prices for specific needs, like a luxury car or a camper van.
